summary: The Making Opportunities Reachable for Everyone Act (MORE Act) amends section 2008 of the Social Security Act to prioritize grant applicants for health profession opportunity grants who partner with specific entities. These partners include state and local government agencies, educational institutions, workforce development boards, and healthcare employers. The bill aims to improve healthcare access by incentivizing collaboration between grant applicants and various community stakeholders. The amendments made by this Act shall take effect on October 1, 2025.
